Successfully imported， you can restore it from Menu-Preferences-backups
（Caution: If your desktop is full, the apps will not be showing after 9 screens.）

When you have lesser rows, some icons will not be shown.

Password can be used to every unlock the lockscreen

Two input are different, please re-enter the password

The lock screen does not support password settings. To set the password, please upgrade the lock screen.
The lock screen does not support password settings. To set the password, please upgrade the lock screen.
Please enter the password you want to set
You have set the screen lock password. Please enter your password again to carry out other task
Password must be fewer than %d characters
Password must be at least %d characters
Password must be contain at least one letter
Password must be contain at least one character
Password must be fewer than one symbol
Applied successfully! If you have forgotten your password, you can press the volume key↑(up) twice and volume key ↓(down), then pressthe back key to unlock.
